name: 1 HOP (itch)
description:
CONTROLS NOT WORKING? TRY CLICKING THE FULLSCREEN-BUTTON!!! (or try this version instead)

1 HOP is a an endlessrunner made for One Button Jam 2016.

Jumping and gliding is controlled by the C, N or Z keys.

1 HOP is a rather small game and is mostly just the result of me learning to code in Pico-8. I hope some will still find it enjoyable for a brief play!
